article.title: PacificTech-Sauer to Build Information Operations Center at Fort Bragg
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: PacificTech-Sauer J.V., Jacksonville, Florida, was awarded a more than $9 million firm-fixed-price contract for the construction of an operational communications facility to be used as the Joint Communication Unit Headquarters and Information Operations Facility at Fort Bragg, North Carolina.Â The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Savannah, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
